languages.text: {n}Мастер вокса наклоняется чуть ближе к вам.{/n} "Господин Хейнрикс ван Калокс недавно проявлял интерес к нашим коммуникационным станциям и вокс-сетям. Кажется, господин дознаватель крайне подкован в вопросах священных технологий... и это несколько тревожит меня. Человек такого знания и такого рода работы способен незаметно встроить в наши системы собственные устройства. Мы будем бдительны, Лорд-капитан, но и вы постарайтесь быть осторожнее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер Вокса наклоняется чуть ближе к вам и понижает голос.{/n} "Господин Хейнрикс ван Калокс недавно расспрашивал моих офицеров об исправности коммуникационных станций, корабельных передатчиках и сплетениях наших вокс-сетей. Кажется, господин дознаватель крайне подкован в подобного рода вопросах и способен незаметно встроить в наши системы собственные устройства. Мы будем бдительны, Лорд-капитан, но и вы постарайтесь быть осторожнее".

languages.text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер вокса наклоняется чуть ближе к вам.{/n} "Господин Хейнрикс ван Калокс недавно проявлял интерес к нашим коммуникационным станциям и вокс-сетям. Кажется, господин дознаватель крайне подкован в вопросах священных технологий... и это несколько тревожит меня. Человек такого знания и такого рода работы способен незаметно встроить в наши системы собственные устройства. Мы будем бдительны, Лорд-капитан, но и вы постарайтесь быть осторожнее".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-networks a short while ago. Master interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of this knowledge in his line of work is capably of discreetly incorporating his own devices into our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

{n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

languages.text: {n}La maestra de vocos se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «El maestro Heinrix van Calox expresó interés por nuestras estaciones de comunicaciones y redes de vocos hace poco. El interrogador parece saber mucho sobre tecnología sagrada... es preocupante. Un hombre con esos conocimientos y que se dedica a esa profesión sería capaz de integrar sus propios dispositivos en nuestros sistemas de forma discreta. Estaremos atentos, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, pero le ruego que tenga cuidado de todos modos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de vocos se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «El maestro Heinrix van Calox expresó interés por nuestras estaciones de comunicaciones y redes de vocos hace poco. El interrogador parece saber mucho sobre tecnología sagrada... es preocupante. Un hombre con esos conocimientos y que se dedica a esa profesión sería capaz de integrar sus propios dispositivos en nuestros sistemas de forma discreta. Estaremos atentos, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, pero le ruego que tenga cuidado de todos modos».

languages.text: {n}音阵大师朝你靠了过来。{/n}“不久之前，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯大师表示对我们的通讯站与音阵网络非常感兴趣。那位审讯官似乎对神圣技术的相关知识非常了解……这不禁让我很担心。像他这种知识丰富、又从事这方面工作的人，完全有能力在我们的系统中悄悄地植入他自己的设备。我们会保持警惕，舰长大人，但您也应该试着更加谨慎才是。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师朝你靠了过来。{/n}“不久之前，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯大师表示对我们的通讯站与音阵网络非常感兴趣。那位审判官似乎对神圣技术的相关知识非常了解……这不禁让我很担心。像他这种知识丰富、又从事这方面工作的人，完全有能力在我们的系统中悄悄地植入他自己的设备。我们会保持警惕，舰长大人，但您也应该试着更加谨慎才是。”

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスマスターが耳元に顔を近づける。{/n}「少し前に、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス殿が、私達の通信ステーションとヴォクスネットに興味を示されていました。インテロゲイターは神聖な技術のあれこれにお詳しい様子…そこが私には心配です。あれだけの知識とあれほどの職業の方なら、こちらのシステムを自分の装置にコッソリ埋め込むことができるでしょう。ロード・キャプテン、こちらも警戒しますが、あなたも一層ご注意いただきますようお願いします」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスマスターが耳元に顔を近づける。{/n}「少し前に、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス殿が、私達の通信ステーションとヴォクスネットに興味を示されていました。インテロゲイターは神聖な技術のあれこれにお詳しい様子…そこが私には心配です。あれだけの知識とあれほどの職業の方なら、こちらのシステムを自分の装置にコッソリ埋め込むことができるでしょう。ロード・キャプテン、こちらも警戒しますが、あなたも一層ご注意いただきますようお願いします」

languages.text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin beugt sich näher zu dir.{/n} "Meister Heinrix van Calox hat sich vor Kurzem für unsere Kommunikationsstationen und Voxnetze interessiert. Der Interrogator scheint sich in Fragen der heiligen Technologie gut auszukennen ... Und das macht mir Sorgen. Ein Mann mit seinem Wissen und seinem Beruf könnte unauffällig eigene Geräte in unseren Systemen platzieren. Wir werden wachsam sein, Lord Captain, aber auch Ihr solltet versuchen, vorsichtiger zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin beugt sich näher zu dir.{/n} "Meister Heinrix van Calox hat sich vor Kurzem für unsere Kommunikationsstationen und Voxnetze interessiert. Der Interrogator scheint sich in Fragen der heiligen Technologie gut auszukennen ... Und das macht mir Sorgen. Ein Mann mit seinem Wissen und seinem Beruf könnte unauffällig eigene Geräte in unseren Systemen platzieren. Wir werden wachsam sein, Lord Captain, aber auch Ihr solltet versuchen, vorsichtiger zu sein."

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse-vox se penche vers vous.{/n} « Il y a peu, maître Heinrix van Calox a exprimé son intérêt pour nos postes de communication et nos réseaux-vox. L'interrogateur semble en savoir long sur la technologie sacrée... et cela m'inquiète. Un membre de l'Inquisition possédant de telles connaissances serait capable d'installer ses propres appareils dans nos systèmes à notre insu. Nous serons vigilants, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais vous devriez vous-même faire preuve de prudence. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse-vox se penche vers vous.{/n} « Il y a peu, maître Heinrix van Calox a exprimé son intérêt pour nos postes de communication et nos réseaux-vox. L'interrogateur semble en savoir long sur la technologie sacrée... et cela m'inquiète. Un membre de l'Inquisition possédant de telles connaissances serait capable d'installer ses propres appareils dans nos systèmes à notre insu. Nous serons vigilants, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais vous devriez vous-même faire preuve de prudence. »

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı kulağına eğiliyor.{/n} "Üstat Heinrix von Calox, kısa bir süre önce iletişim istasyonlarımız ve voks ağlarımızla ilgilendiğini belirtmişti. Sorgucu, kutsal teknolojiler konusunda epey bilgi sahibi birine benziyor. Bu da beni endişelendiriyor. Böyle bir meslekteki, bu derece bilgili bir adam, kendi cihazlarını sistemlerimize gizlice entegre etmeyi başarabilir. Biz dikkatli olacağız Lord Kaptan, yalnız sizin de dikkatli olmanız gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master leans closer to you.{/n} "Master Heinrix van Calox expressed interest in our communication stations and vox-nets a short while ago. The Interrogator appears to be very well versed in the matters of sacred technology... And it worries me. A man of his knowledge and in his line of work is capable of discreetly planting his own devices in our systems. We will be vigilant, Lord Captain, but you should try to be more careful as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks Üstadı kulağına yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Üstat Heinrix von Calox kısa bir süre önce iletişim istasyonlarımız ve voks ağlarımızla ilgilendiğini belirtti. Sorgucu, kutsal teknolojiler konusunda son derece bilgili gibi görünüyor ve bu da beni endişelendiriyor. Böyle bir meslekteki, bu derece bilgili bir adam, kendi cihazlarını sistemlerimize gizlice entegre etmeyi başarabilir. Dikkatli olacağız Lord Kaptan ama sizin de daha dikkatli olmanız gerek."
